messages.message:
cc: @Shubham @Deeksha, we should consider this when we improve the invoices app. As a near term fix, we could also consider instructing the model not to do math and only return the `sub_total` and `total_tax` if it is present in the document, else return `N/A`.

@Deeksha, if you have capacity, would you be able to experiment on this with @ChrisMâ€™s doc?
The invoices app is actually pretty versatile usually. I tried it on a comedy show invoice I had that looks quite different than our samples here and it worked quite well!

Separately, completely agree with you @ChrisM that we need validations/confidence scores to enable customers to use apps in prod. Even 80%+ accuracy is not good enough since it would mean that customers would need to check all the output from the app
